title: evening_feeding_one_month_old_puppies
summary: Evening feeding session for puppies approximately one month old, beginning dry food intake.
description: Evening feeding of dogs at MaMeeFarm. Puppies approximately one month old were observed consuming dry dog food. Adult dogs were also present and fed during the same session.

context_notes.security_context: Perimeter secured with fencing and gate. One adult dog previously missing after leaving the property independently. No direct evidence recorded within this data unit.

external_reference.note: External reference provided for verification only.
